name: House of the Soul
description:
Begin a journey of deception and discovery in 'HOUSE OF THE SOUL', a first-person exploration and story based experience inspired by 'Resident Evil' and 'Gone Home'. Explore an isolated mansion and descend into its lower levels as you discover the hidden secret project of the obsessive inventor who lives there.

You play as Detective Dahlia Everett, directed to the De La Crevier mansion by a mysterious whistleblower convinced that the mansion has played host to a series of dark deeds. But when she arrives, the mansion is seemingly unoccupied- is there more to this place than meets the eye?

Key Features
  • Three distinct levels to explore, each with their own layer of the De La Crevier mystery to uncover
  • Unique puzzles in every level to test Detective Everett's skills
  • An twisted tale of intrigue and investigation to follow from beginning to end

Dare you unlock the mysteries within the HOUSE OF THE SOUL?
